A fun game on both sides of the battle- killer and survivor. It struggles most in terms of balancing and community, as meta has almost completely taken over the builds and toxicity runs rampant on both sides. Friends make it much more bearable, and the community memes are charming. The killers licenses in this game are great, and I recommend the game to fans of the horror genre. See you in the fog!

Once you get into it, as long as the season hasn't restarted you'll probably have the time of your life. But trust me. After a week all of you killer mains will vanish. There's a great number quirks and oopsies the devs have made. Many metas and tricks. Generally though. A killer will get their cheeks double hand spread by survivors. This is because of the amazing tool called discord. Having four sets of eyes on you at once makes it nearly impossible to apply any gen pressure. (unless you're a killer who specializes in it) but trappers and wraiths will get bullied into the ground unless they have a massive coincidental play. 

But is the game something i can recommend? Well view it as literal crack cocaine. It will give you the highest highs and the fattest smile on your face. But also the lowest lows where you just want to curb stomp the next person who used decisive strike on you. 

So yes, I do recommend the game just because of the extremely funny moments the game has. As well as the incredible feelings you can get. The characters feel somewhat dynamic (sometimes) and it is an incredible game that captures the slasher genre.

Also. The real reason why the survivor count is high is because it's great with friends. Seriously. Play this game with some friends and you'll be laughing your asses off.

And for killers, well good luck. Boons are out and are giving all survivors 5 perks instead of 4.
most fun you can have when you dont want to have fun

Fun. Only problem with the game would be bad SBMM. 
Otherwise, 10/10.
This game's title describes my sex life

Already a classic in terror-survival games. Excellent aesthetics and gameplay. A lot of fun if you take it as a casual non-competitive game. Matchmaking sometimes is terrible, as it happens with any multi-player game.

This game is buggy, and probably not that good, but I'm addicted. Just be sure to never visit the official forums, and expect people to make up rules about how you can play the game, and you're (nearly) good to go.

Honestly, i love this game. But i also hate it. It's broken in so many ways and in others not. The company who runs it, doesnt really listen to their community, or fix the things that are broken. It's un balanced and it rewards players for the most selfish tactics, in a otherwise team based game for survivors, and rewards killers for the most lazy and boring game play ever, which is to tunnel and camp.  The community itself, is majorly toxic people on either side of the game i.e Killer or survivor, and they're destroying the game as a whole. 

Will I recommed it as it is right now? No, i honestly wouldnt. 
Would i recommend the game over all: Probably, it CAN be fun. When you get that 1 game out of 20 where you actually get a chance to play the game as its intended.

Developers are just making money out of nothing. Literally... Despite the fact that new dlc's are very similar, an ENORMOUS amout of bugs that has appeared when the game had just released isn't going to be fixed. I'm kinda in two minds but by over assuming everything I say that this game isn't worth your money.

Ахуенная игра и тамада хороший, сыграя в эту игру вы получите столько эмоций и также выучить новые слова, к примеру: мать ебал хуйня сучья, ебал маньяка я в жопу, тиммейт уебище ебаное умри, а также играя за маньяка вы станите ебланом для других игроков и уже будете обзывать не вы, а вас.
